Reference

All functions

MiniBenchmark()

Perform a quick test of the PMM example likelihood calculation

NewPMMCppObject()

Create an instance of the RCPP_PMM module for a given tree and trait data

PMMLogLik()

Calculate the PMM log-likelihood for a given tree, data and model parameters

PMMLogLikCpp()

Calculate the PMM log-likelihood for a given tree, data and model parameters using the RCPP_PMM module

PlotParallelTraversal()

Global definitions needed for the R-check to pass

SPLITT::At

A sub-vector with the elements at given positions.

SPLITT::G_EMPTY_UVEC

A global constant for the empty uvec;

SPLITT::G_NA_UINT

A global constant for the integer NA.

SPLITT::G_PI

The mathematical constant Pi.

SPLITT::IsNA

Check a vector for NAs.

SPLITT::Match

Match the first occurrences of elements in a vector of integers.

SPLITT::NotIsNA

Check a vector for NAs.

SPLITT::OrderedTree::LengthType

Abstract type for the branch-lengths in a OrderedTree.

SPLITT::OrderedTree::NodeType

Abstract type for nodes in the tree.

SPLITT::OrderedTree::OrderedTree

Constructor for class OrderedTree.

SPLITT::OrderedTree::RangeIdPruneNode

First and last id (0-based node indices) of the PruneNode-range at a step

SPLITT::OrderedTree::RangeIdVisitNode

First and last id (0-based node indices) of the VisitNode-range at a level

SPLITT::OrderedTree::num_levels

Number of levels (ranges) of parallel VisitNode operations during post-order traversal.

SPLITT::OrderedTree::num_parallel_ranges_prune

Number of parallel ranges of nodeduring

SPLITT::OrderedTree::ranges_id_prune

Internally stored vector of start ids for each PruneNode-range

SPLITT::OrderedTree::ranges_id_visit

Internally stored vector of start ids for each VisitNode-range

SPLITT::OrderedTree

A generic tree class optimized for parallel ordered traversal.

SPLITT::Seq

Generate a sequence of consecutive integers.

SPLITT::SortIndices

Indices in a vector ordered in ascending order of the corresponding values.

SPLITT::ThreadExceptionHandler

An internal class for thread-safe exception hadling within parallel sections.

SPLITT::TraversalAlgorithm

Base-class for parallel tree traversal implementations.

SPLITT::TraversalSpecification

An abstract base class for specifying node traversal operations.

SPLITT::TraversalTask

A composite of a tree, a traversal specification and a traversal algorithm.

SPLITT::TraversalTaskLightweight

A lighter TraversalTask class which gets a reference to an already constructed tree.

SPLITT::Tree::BranchLengths

Get a reference to the internal vector of branch lengths.

SPLITT::Tree::FindChildren

Get a vector with the ids of the children of a node.

SPLITT::Tree::FindIdOfNode

Get the internally stored id of a node.

SPLITT::Tree::FindIdOfParent

Get the parent id of a node with id id_child.

SPLITT::Tree::FindNodeWithId

Get the node with the specified id.

SPLITT::Tree::HasBranchLengths

Does a tree has lengths associated with its branches?

SPLITT::Tree::LengthOfBranch

Get the length of a branch ending at node with id i.

SPLITT::Tree::LengthType

Abstract type for the branch-lengths in a Tree.

SPLITT::Tree::NodeType

Abstract type for nodes in the tree.

SPLITT::Tree::OrderNodes

Reorder a vector of nodes

SPLITT::Tree::OrderNodesPosType

Reorder a vector of nodes (generic w.r.t. the position type).

SPLITT::Tree::SetBranchLengths

Set new branch lengths to selected or all branches in a tree.

SPLITT::Tree::SetLengthOfBranch

Set the length of a branch ending at node with id i to a given value.

SPLITT::Tree::Tree

Constructor for class Tree.

SPLITT::Tree::num_nodes

Number of nodes in a tree.

SPLITT::Tree::num_tips

Number of tips (a.k.a. leaves) in the tree

SPLITT::Tree

Base class Tree.

SPLITT::bvec

a vector of bools.

SPLITT::uint

An alias for the 'unsigned int' basic type.

SPLITT::uvec

a vector of uint's.

SPLITT::vec

a vector of doubles.

SPLITT

SPLITT: A generic C++ library for Serial and Parallel Lineage Traversal of Trees
